abstract.text: Structure containing the methods related to the user’s library.
Fetch an album from the user’s library by using its identifier.
Fetch all songs from the user’s library for a specific genre.
Fetch multiple albums from the user’s library by using their identifiers.
Delete a rating for a music item in the user’s library.
Access the total number of playlists in the user’s library.
Fetch all songs from the user’s library for all albums.
Fetch recently added songs from the user’s library sorted by the date added.
Fetch recently played songs from the user’s library sorted by the date added.
Creates a new playlist in the user’s music library using an array of playlist-addable items.
Delete a rating for a playlist in the user’s library.
Get the rating for a playlist in the user’s library.
Adds a rating for a playlist in the user’s library.
Fetch all playlists from the user’s library in alphabetical order.
Fetch all albums from the user’s library in alphabetical order.
Fetch a song from the user’s library by using its identifier with all properties from the local database.
Adds an array of songs to a specified playlist in the user’s music library.
Fetch multiple songs from the user’s library by using their identifiers.
Fetch the user’s “Made For You” playlists from their library.
Fetch all songs from the user’s library for all artists.
Fetch multiple artists from the user’s library by using their identifiers.
Get the ratings for albums in the user’s library.
Delete a rating for a music video in the user’s library.
Taken from https://github.com/marcelmendesfilho/MusadoraKit/blob/feature/improvements/Sources/MusadoraKit/Library/LibrarySong.swift
Thanks @marcelmendesfilho!

Access the total number of songs in the user’s library.

Creates a new playlist in the user’s music library using song identifiers.
Get the rating for a music video in the user’s library.
